title: Constellation Cradle
album: Carousel (An Examination of the Shadow, Creekflow, and its Life as an Afterthought)
lyrics: There’s nothing you can do about it
You want it? You’ve got it!
When you’re playing, playing with stars!
When you’re playing, playing with stars?
Don’t stray too far from home
It’s your one stop shop for living large!
Take a picture of the picture
Of the picture, of the picture,
What were you born to be?
Is there such thing as destiny?
When you’re playing, playing with stars
When you’re playing, playing with stars
When you’re playing, playing with stars
